dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: South America:  Coastal river drainages from Espírito Santo to Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil and upper Paraná River basin.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Coastal river drainages from Espírito Santo to Rio Grande do Sul States and upper Paraná River basin: Argentina and Brazil.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; potamodromous (Ref. 51243); freshwater; pH range: 5.8 - 8.0; dH range: 30
dataObjects.references: Riede, K. 2004 Global register of migratory species - from global to regional scales. Final Report of the R&D-Projekt 808 05 081. Federal Agency for Nature Conservation, Bonn, Germany. 329 p. (Ref. 51243)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Migration
dataObjects.description: Potamodromous. Migrating within streams, migratory in rivers, e.g. Saliminus, Moxostoma, Labeo.  Migrations should be cyclical and predictable and cover more than 100 km.

There are 4 barcode sequences available from BOLD and GenBank.

Below is a sequence of the barcode region Cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI or COX1) from a member of the species.

See the BOLD taxonomy browser for more complete information about this specimen and other sequences.
